text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7257073043252c2e01c8e168e6842a1121797243|patch 8.1.2362: cannot place signs in a popup window>
patch 8.1.2362: cannot place signs in a popup window

Problem:    Cannot place signs in a popup window. (Maxim Kim)
Solution:   Use the group prefix "PopUp" to specify which signs should show up
            in a popup window. (closes #5277)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2362: cannot place signs in a popup window · vim/vim@7257073
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2362: cannot place signs in a popup window · vim/vim@7257073
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot place signs in a popup window. (Maxim Kim) Solution: Use the group prefix "PopUp" to specify which signs should show up in a popup window. (closes #5277)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dee50a518007b3a59f54b8ad018b6a83993593e7|patch 8.1.2363: ml_get error when accessing Visual area in 'statusline'>
patch 8.1.2363: ml_get error when accessing Visual area in 'statusline'

Problem:    ml_get error when accessing Visual area in 'statusline'.
Solution:   Disable Visual mode when using another window. (closes #5278)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2363: ml_get error when accessing Visual area in 'statusline' · vim/vim@dee50a5
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2363: ml_get error when accessing Visual area in 'statusline' · vim/vim@dee50a5
attachments.text: Problem: ml_get error when accessing Visual area in 'statusline'. Solution: Disable Visual mode when using another window. (closes #5278)
